metadata.title: LTL (Less-than-Truckload) Specialist Resume Template
metadata.description: A professional resume template tailored for LTL (Less-than-Truckload) Specialist positions, highlighting technical skills and project experience

template_tips: Include metrics and impact where possible
Highlight both technical and soft skills
Keep it to one page unless you have 10+ years of experience

resume_content.summary: Results-driven professional with experience in Managing LTL freight shipments and carrier negotiations. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and optimizing performance.

experience.title: LTL Specialist
achievements: Managed an average of 150 LTL shipments monthly, achieving a 98% on-time delivery rate.
Implemented a strategic carrier bidding process, reducing transportation costs by 12%.
Developed relationships with key LTL carriers, leading to a 15% improvement in service levels.

experience.title: LTL Coordinator
achievements: Streamlined LTL shipment tracking through automation, enhancing visibility and reducing manual errors by 30%.
Assisted in renegotiating carrier contracts, which saved the company over $50,000 annually.
Improved customer satisfaction scores from 85% to 92% through proactive communication and problem-solving.

experience.title: Logistics Associate
achievements: Coordinated over 100 LTL shipments monthly, ensuring compliance with customer and carrier requirements.
Assisted in the implementation of a new TMS system, improving routing efficiency by 20%.
Developed an internal training program for new logistics staff, reducing onboarding time by 25%.

projects.name: LTL Optimization Project
projects.description: Led a cross-functional team to develop and implement new strategies for optimizing LTL shipments, resulting in a 20% cost reduction.
